Text: Quality is great, except for the linked subs, which are pretty terrible, and slightly out of sync.

Well the bluray relesed without english subs, so I got a Russian sub which was google translated from french sub...Which google translated to english...so I said conditions apply.

Go figure. LOLz
it really is best waiting for a properly subbed version...
Don't get me wrong; I appreciate the upload, and will hold onto it until proper subs are released. The efforts are appreciated, as always! :-)
